manifest.install: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_izclightbox_items` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `boxid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `attachment` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `index` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `video` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `video_thumb` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `lng` double unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `lat` double unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `address` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `tel` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `wechat` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `map_thumb` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_izclightbox_list` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `weid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `cover` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `cover_title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `thumb` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `music` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `share_title` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_thumb` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_cover` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_url` varchar(300) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_txt` varchar(500) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `share_button` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `share_tips` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `reply_title` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `reply_thumb` varchar(300) NOT NULL, `reply_description` varchar(1000) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `ims_izclightbox_reply` ( `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `rid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `list_id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), KEY `idx_rid` (`rid`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
